name: Gardas (Working Title) a Retro SNES style SHMUP
name_original: Gardas (Working Title) a Retro SNES style SHMUP
description:
Windos 64 Bit PC Demo only

As the title suggests this is Retro SNES style SHMUP (Shoot em' Up) game.

This Demo is 2 stages and supports local 2 player co-op with gamepads only. Single player mode is keyboard friendly, though I would recommend using a gamepad anyway. I have extensively tested this in single player and have tested the 2nd player functionality using gamepad 2 but unfortunately I have not had the opportunity to give it a full on test of 2 players at once through the 2 stages.

I recommend closing steam and killing it in task manager since some controller configurations steam has interferes with the gamepads by binding keyboard and mouse functions to the controllers.

Any feedback would be appreciated, especially if you can test 2 player mode with a friend.
